pullrequest.title: Implement Coulomb joint friction for ODE (#381)

content.raw: Could you add some documentation to the SetParam function in Joint.hh that describes the relationship between fmax and friction? Some people might try to set both `friction` and `fmax`, and get confused about the results.
content.html: Could you add some documentation to the SetParam function in Joint.hh that describes the relationship between fmax and friction? Some people might try to set both friction and fmax, and get confused about the results.
